-1.title: Projeto Piloto and Brasil Ride PT 1
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Vienna Air King, Tour of California and Bike Jumping
1.plot: This 'Better Than Four' episode features a variety of cycling disciplines. We begin with 'Vienna Air King' that attracts famous BMX pros from around Europe. We then follow a German team during 'Tour of California' and then move onto a more independent discipline in which a group of amateur bikers show off their jumping skills.

2.title: An Exotic Ride and Fix Your Own Bike
2.plot: This episode reviews a variety of exotic routes in Thailand and features a new cycling culture from England, where riders show off tricks on bikes which they have built themselves.

3.title: California Roads and BMX History
3.plot: This episode brings highlights from a documentary about the cycling culture in Los Angeles, including city races in a less-than-friendly environment for cyclists. BT4 then goes back in time to tell the full history of the rapidly growing BMX discipline.

4.title: Winter Cycling
4.plot: This episode includes tips and tricks for amateurs and professionals alike, who enjoy cycling in those harsh Winter months. This is followed by a video of an adventure cyclist during one of his rides in Northern Sweden.

5.title: London Bike Show
5.plot: In this episode we start off with a performance from the legendary Martyn Ashton, who, coupled with the extreme biking pro 'Blake Samson', gives a stunning performance full of big airs and technical trials riding. This is followed by a cycling television-based game, which some professionals use for training. This episode concludes by featuring a cycling ramp of half a meter wide; on which many professionals (such as Scott Beaumont and Bernard Kerr) compete against each other.

6.title: Cycling Adventure Around the World
6.plot: One of the biggest adventure cyclists, Leon McCarron, completes his around-the-world trip at the age of 23. BT4 features the best of this once in a lifetime experience.

7.title: Alternative Cycling
7.plot: This episode looks at many alternative ways of using a bike. Beginning with a bike-polo tournament in London, we then feature bikes that have been recycled from dying trees. The episode resolves with unique bike designs such as a rocking-chair cycle in the shape of a unicorn.

8.title: Cycling Safety
8.plot: This episode focuses on the changes that have occurred following the increase of two-wheeled traffic. We look at the changes that have been applied to London's roads to make it safer for cyclists. BT4 then travels to Wales where a small town is installing the first ever 'cycle-train' in Great Britain.

9.title: Discovering the Mysterious Lake
9.plot: This documentary follows the cycling legend Hans Rey on one of his adventures in the Himalayas, where he discovers a mysterious lake filled with human bones.

10.title: Empire of Dirt
10.plot: This episode of Better than Four goes behind the scenes with two of the best from the BMX world. We begin with an exclusive insight into the BMX legend Sam Pilgrim, finding out just how he crafts his stunning and unique riding style. A video diary from German BMX champion Andi Wittman is up next. Wittman, who strove to impress with a fantastic win at the Riva del Garda, tells how he overcame constant injury to get ready for the intense 2012 season.

11.title: Cape Epic
11.plot: This episode of Better Than Four comes from deep in the wilderness of South Africa, where 1200 riders take part in the 'ABSA Cape Epic Untamed African Mountain Bike Race'. This 8-day, 800km gauntlet, is undertaken by pros and amateurs alike, giving birth to new heroes of MTB.

12.title: Chasing Gravity and Adventures
12.plot: Two young, ambitious MTB riders kick off this episode of Better Than Four, on a mission than takes them through the treacherous terrain of the American South. Seasoned rider Tim Royle then takes over, showing how he goes from preparation to taking on some of the most challenging routes England has to offer.

13.title: Riva del Garda
13.plot: This week, Better Than Four brings the best action from the Sympatex festival in Riva del Garda, Italy. 2,300 riders from across the globe battle for victory in a variety of gruelling rides, everyone eager to take home a prize on the podium; but in an event where even the world's top champion riders are pushed to the limit, nobody knows who will come out on top.

14.title: CS Racing and Behind the Scenes Cycling
14.plot: This week's Better Than Four features CS Racing, one of the most intense cycling disciplines in the world, known for its short and intense racing. We also take you behind the scenes of cycling itself for an intimate look at those who don't normally get the limelight.

15.title: Mironovic, Rampage and Strength Numbers
15.plot: This week on Better Than Four, it's all about mountain biking. This episode features one of the stars of the discipline, Miroslav Mironovic; the best action from the USA's Rampage area, and the trailer for the biking film of the year Strength in Numbers

16.title: Bike Festival, BMX'N by the Sea & Martyn Ashton's Madness
16.plot: This week on Better Than Four, we head to Germany for the Incredible three-day event that is the Willinger Bike Festival. Then, we meet Martin Soderstrom who shows us his insane BMX skills. We finish up in the UK, where Martyn Ashton takes cycling to another level altogether - using a road bike for mountain bike stunts!

17.title: Freeride Festival, Weavers & Metro Ride
17.plot: We head to Hinterglemm, Austria for an epic Freeride Festival. Then, to Spain and the UK for two spectacular and unusual cycling events unlike anything you've seen before.

18.title: Oetztaler Championship and Belgian Ride
18.plot: This week on Better than Four, we head to Austria for an epic cycle marathon. Then, to Belgium and a fight for inner city cycling, wrapping up with all the action from this year's Big Duel in the Ukraine.

19.title: R.Evolution & Descenso Del Condor
19.plot: We go to the first ever R.Evolution, we check out an incredible MTB trail film in the USA, and see all the action from this year's Descenso del Condor in Bolivia.

20.title: Bike TransAlp
20.plot: An incredible mountain bike challenge in Germany - this year's Bike Transalp.

21.title: Where the Trail Ends & Cape Town Ride
21.plot: We follow modern cycling pioneers on a once in a lifetime journey, and then head to cape town, for an amazing ride with Danny Macaskill.

22.title: 26 Trix & Rough Riderz
22.plot: This week on Better than Four, we head to Austria for the dirt jump spectacular, 26 TRIX and catch some amazing trail footage while we learn about the hottest new trend hitting the MTB world, with the Roughriderz.

23.title: Whitestyle & Riding on the Radar
23.plot: This week on Better than Four, we head to Austria to see some ski-slope MTB , to Canada and Ukraine for two epic thrill rides, wrapping up behind the scenes with Szymon Godziek.

24.title: Pump Riders, FourByThree & Fox Hunt
24.plot: This week, we have an alternative take on head to head riding at the 'Pump Riders' in Prague. Next a trailer for the new four part series based on the world famous Atherton siblings. Then we head to Northern Ireland, for a very British event: the 'Foxhunt'. But this time, in this intense downhill MTB experience, the hunters become the hunted.

25.title: Hill Chasers, Moontime Bike & Road Rage
25.plot: This week's two wheeled adventure starts off in Romania, where we watch an intense night race. Then we head to Malaysia for 'Hill Chasers', which asks the question which bike discipline is the best uphill? Finally we head to the Pyrenees, for an intense downhill on-road race.

26.title: Circle of Balance & Best of 2012
26.plot: In this episode we are in Japan for the 'Circle of Balance', the world's leading BMX-Flatland competition, before going over some of our favourite moments from the past year.

1.title: Gran Fondo, More Dirt & Giro D'Italia
1.plot: This week on Better Than Four. One of the biggest urban races in the world, Gran Fondo, New York. Then we visit the More Dirt Team at the South West Downhill Championships, taking place in Gawton. Finally one of the three Grand Tours, the most prestigious cycling events in the world, The Giro D'Italia.

2.title: Trans Provence Part 1
2.plot: Welcome to Better Than Four. This week we're travelling across France for a unique mountain biking event: The Trans Provence. From the North West of the Durance Valley to Monaco, these intrepid racers will spend the next 7 days on the road; or should I say mountain trails.

3.title: Trans Provence Part 2
3.plot: This week on Better Than Four we're back in France to catch the last few stages of the incredible Trans Provence. This one of a kind event is a 7 day, downhill mountain biking extravaganza, travelling through the French peaks. It is the World's first and only multi-day point-to-point race which is won on single-track through a number of timed stages throughout the day.

4.title: Haute Route Part 1
4.plot: This week, Better Than Four is in the alps for the incredible Haute Route Cyclosportive.

5.title: Haute Route Part 2
5.plot: This week, Better Than Four is back in the alps for the climactic conclusion of the Haute Route Cyclosportive.

6.title: Last Kilometer Exclusive
6.plot: This week, we sit for an exclusive interview with Film Director Paolo Casalis to talk about his film - the last kilometre.

7.title: Cape Epic & BMX Spine Battle
7.plot: We start the show in South Africa down in Cape Town and the Western Cape for the 10th anniversary of the Cape Epic a untamed mountain bike competition with the world best riders from around the globe. We then head to the BMX spine in Germany for some crazy freestyle BMX riding. This week we finish off in Gisburn forest UK for some epic downhill mountain biking.

8.title: SA Bike Dreams
8.plot: We follow Team MTN Qhubeka one of South Africa's most celebrated cycling teams as they make their own mark on the road biking sport

9.title: Unicycle, Nine Knights, Eng Champs, BMX Worlds
9.plot: Better than four takes you on a journey around the world highlighting some of the finest events and competitions as well as individual talent this sport has to offer.

10.title: Berg Line 7 Lesotho SK
10.plot: This week on Better than four we showcase two of this best mountain bike events in the world. We start this episode at the Berg Line and then finish off at the incredible Lesotho Sky.

11.title: Four Peaks
11.plot: We start this weeks Better Than 4 at the Four Peaks 4 days mountain bike event hosting pro and amateur athletes from around the world.

12.title: EBC, the Mont 24 Hour & Rock Air
12.plot: We arrive in Switzerland at the Eiger Bike Challenge a 85km long mountain bike challenge hosting over 1500 participants. We are soon down under in Australia for the Mont 24 Hour the largest mountain bike event in the country. We are then back to Switzerland for Rocket Air the biggest slopestyle event in the world for some crazy biking action.

13.title: Alpentour Trophy
13.plot: We are at the 15th Alpentour trophy event a challenging uphill struggle for professionals and amateurs alike.

14.title: Bikes & Beats & Peak to Creek
14.plot: We get involved at the bikes and beats festival Austria. Hosting a variety of events from downhill to freestyle biking to beatboxing and DJ shows. Alongside a huge expo this week it's all about the mountain bike community coming together for a 3 day festival of celebration and recognition of the sport.

15.title: C.I MTB Rounds 1 & 2
15.plot: In its 18th consecutive year we are at the Copa International MTB the biggest mountain bike event in South America. Amongst stunning scenery 1,200 riders descend upon the city of Araxa for this grueling 5 day event.

16.title: Transalp
16.plot: This week we are at the world famous TransAlp. Participants must complete over 650km of unforgiving tracks over this 8 day event in the spectacular dolomites.

17.title: Riva Bike Festival & Patrick Seabase
17.plot: This week we head over to the Beautiful Lake Gardo for the 20th Anniversary of the Riva Bike Festival. Hosting many events from down hill mountain biking to freestyle BMX. Then we head to France to witness the incredible achievement of a true biking hero, Patrick Seabase.

18.title: Freestyle Bike Tour, Wheelin & Flatland BMX
18.plot: This week we are privileged to be invited to the Animal Bike Tour at the Excel London. We get a insight into Vintage bikes in the USA by trendy Minds and witness some awesome tricks from the flat line BMX.

19.title: Wembo, Highland Fling & Line of Sight
19.plot: Its Wembo time here on Better than for as we head to Italy for the second part for the Wembo 24hr Solo Race. We then get a taster of what is to come on better than four in the coming weeks as we see highlights from the Highland Fling in Australia and a trailer from the cult film Line Of Sight.

20.title: Mongolia Bike Challenge
20.plot: This week we head to one of the most challenging but rewarding Bike events in the world, The Mongolia Bike Challenge. A long and challenging race, open both to professionals racers and high level amateurs, which will take place entirely in the lonely steppes of Mongolia from which, in the XIII century, the local herdsmen departed led by the valiant Gengis Khan in a short lived but also fast conquest of central Europe, China and the Middle east.

21.title: Line of Sight
21.plot: We get a sneak peak at Lucas Brunelle's cult film A line of sight. About bike messengers and the Alley cat races they compete in all over the world.

22.title: Brussels Express & the Man Who Lived on His Bike
22.plot: Following on from last week we stick to the messengers theme and take a look at a man who has built a successful career running messages around Brussels as a courier. We them get an exclusive airing of The Man Who Lives ON His Bike, a unique and interesting look at what the bike can offer the individual.

23.title: Jack Gear, Bike Festival Willengen, TS Epic
23.plot: We start off this week at the famous Willengen bike festival taking a look at all the events from the juniors to the professionals. We then get a teasers of this years TS Epic a 7 day gruelling stage race. We finish up this week at the jack gear invitational at Leopallooza festival.

24.title: Fixation Movie Sneak Peak
24.plot: We are lucky enough to have a exclusive look at the movie fixation, a brilliant documentary into the importance and development of fixed gear bikes

25.title: EBC, Schitzeljagd & Markus Braumann
25.plot: A famous mountain bike race in the heart of the Swiss alps we bring you highlights from the whole event from the junior quick race to the 88km uphill challenge. Then a one of a kind event in the Germany forest as riders compete in a treasure hunt. To round off this week we get a brilliant profile on pro BMX & Vans team rider Markus Braumann.

26.title: UCI Mountain Bike World Cup (TBC)
26.plot: Highlights from the UCI Mountain bike world cup in Fort William.

imdb.plot outline: Better Than Four is the premier all-action cycling show, featuring everything from mountain biking to competitive stage road racing, as well as street and freestyle BMX. BT4 even offers coverage of the Haute Route tours, "the highest and toughest Cyclo-Sportives in the world", and the European grand tours, represented by the Giro D'Italia; granting a level of access unprecedented in the world of cycle-sport TV. Alongside event features and professional commentary, BT4 also offers exclusive rider profiles. With camera work so exhilarating it'll bring you to the edge of your seat, BT4 is the only show capable of recreating the thrill of two wheels in the comfort of your living room. A must for any cycling enthusiast, from free-riding pros to novices just losing their training wheels!
imdb.title: Better Than Four
plot: _Better Than Four_ (qv) is the premier all-action cycling show, featuring everything from mountain biking to competitive stage road racing, as well as street and freestyle BMX. BT4 even offers coverage of the Haute Route tours, "the highest and toughest Cyclo-Sportives in the world", and the European grand tours, represented by the Giro D'Italia; granting a level of access unprecedented in the world of cycle-sport TV. Alongside event features and professional commentary, BT4 also offers exclusive rider profiles. With camera work so exhilarating it'll bring you to the edge of your seat, BT4 is the only show capable of recreating the thrill of two wheels in the comfort of your living room. A must for any cycling enthusiast, from free-riding pros to novices just losing their training wheels!::Boulder Creek International
